docs.lead_paragraph: An article on Saturday about an appearance by Hillary Rodham Clinton before a meeting of doctors in Las Vegas, Nev., misidentified an obstetrician who told her that trial lawyers as well as doctors should be willing to sacrifice for health care reform. He was Dr. Allan Boruszak, not Dr. William Bossak.
